64605.「……材料さえ 取ってきてくれれば\n 薬を作れて この人が治るかもしれないのよ:
...If only you could get me the ingredients, I
could make a potion that might cure this man!

64606.「そんなこと言って オレたちを\n 危険な目に遭わせようとしてんじゃないのか？:
Oi, lass! Yer not tryin' ta put us in
danger by yappin' that, are ya?

64607.「その薬で治る保証が どこにあるのよ！？\n アンタの言うことなんか\n 信じら:
What guarantee do you have that this medicine
will cure him? How can I believe anything you
say?

64608.「ガクガクガク……。\n 寒い 寒い 寒い……。: So... so... so... c... c... cold...

64609.「この人 助けたくないの？\n 仲間が 死んじゃってもいいの！？:
Don't you want to help him? Would you rather
see your companion die?!

64610.「でも アンタのことは 信じられない！\n ベルムド王に さんざん たてついて…:
But I don't believe you! You have been so
vindictive towards King Bermud... and now he's
dead because of you!

64612.「ちょうど よかった！ 今 困ってたの。\n 最近 城下町で 寒い寒いって 身体:
Just what I needed! I'm in trouble. Lately, there's a disease going around the castle town that makes people shiver and shake with
the cold...

64613.「それで 病気について 調べてみたら\n このまま 放っておくと 凍死してしまう:
So I did some research, and found out it's a
deadly disease...if left untreated, it causes
those affected to freeze to death.

64614.「治すには 特別な薬が必要なんだけど\n ローヌにんじんと サリュウコツって\n:
If I'm to cure him, I need a special kind of medicine. But I can't make it without some ingredients. I need a Rhone Carrot and a
Sand Bone.

64615.「私は ここで 薬を作る準備を\n しなきゃならないから <pc>さんに\n 材:
I'll need your help in getting those while I
stay here and prepare the medicine.

64616.「この人たちに 集めてきてもらうように\n お願いしてたんだけど 断られちゃって:
I've been trying to get these guys to get them
for me, but they said no, so... what do you
think?

64617.「ホント？ ありがとう！ ローヌにんじんは\n こっちの世界の ローヌ樹林帯の\:
Really? Thank you! Rhone Carrots are supposed
to grow in the far south of the Rhone
Woodlands on this side of the world.

64618.「サリュウコツは こっちの世界の\n アラハギーロ地方の 東の砂漠にいる\n <:
It seems you can find Sand Bones by defeating
Dragon Zombies in the eastern desert of this
world's Al-Ahagiro Region.

64619.「私 ここで 調合の準備をして 待ってるね。:
I'll stay here and prepare the medicine and
wait for you.

64620.「おいおい なに 勝手に話進めてんだよ！\n 早く こっから出てってくれ！:
'Ey, 'ey! What are ya talkin' about? You
and dis bloke should get out o' here!

64621.「私…… この人を治すまで\n 絶対 ここを出ていかないわ。\n そう決めたの！:
I'm not leaving here until I cure him. I've
made up my mind!

64622.「じゃあ ローヌにんじんと\n サリュウコツを 集めたら\n ここへ戻ってきてね:
Come back here after you collect the
Rhone Carrot and Sand Bone, <pc>.

64623.「ホント！？ あっ でも……\n <pc>さん 他の人からの頼まれごとも\n い:
Really? Oh, but...<pc> You must be
taking on a lot of requests from other people,
too.

64624.「じゃあ 今は頼めないね。\n 仕方ないから ダメもとで もう１回\n あの人た:
Then I can't ask you now. I have no choice.
I'll ask those people one more time, just as a
last-ditch effort!

64625.「そっか……。仕方ないね。\n <pc>さんになら お願いできると\n 思ってた:
Oh well... I have no choice. I was hoping
<pc> could help.

64626.「それじゃあ 私 ダメもとで もう１回\n あの人たちに 頼んでみるわ！:
Well then, I'm going to ask them one more
time, just for the heck of it!

64627.「……あなたたちが この材料さえ\n 集めてきてくれれば 薬が作れて\n この人:
...If only you guys could gather these
ingredients, we could make a potion that might
cure this man!

64628.「お前の言うことなんか 信用できっか！: I don't believe a word you say!

64629.「早く ここから出てってちょうだいよ！: Get the hell out of here!

64631.「最近 城下町で 寒い寒いって\n 震えている人がいるから いろいろ調べて\n:
Lately, I've been seeing people shivering in
the castle town, so I did some research and
found a medicine to cure them.

64632.「でも その薬を作るのには\n ローヌにんじんと サリュウコツって\n 材料が:
But to make that potion, we need Rhone Carrots
and Sand Bone...

64633.「私は ここで 薬を作る準備を\n しなきゃならないから <pc>さんに\n 材:
I'll need your help in getting those while I
stay here and prepare the medicine.

64634.「この人たちに 集めてきてもらうように\n お願いしてたんだけど 断られちゃって:
I've been trying to get these guys to get them
for me, but they said no, so... what do you
think?

64635.「あっ <pc>さん。\n お願いしてた 薬の材料集めは\n どんな感じかな？:
Ah <pc>. How's the gathering of
ingredients for the potion I asked you to help
me with?

64636.「ローヌにんじんは こっちの世界の\n ローヌ樹林帯の 南の果てに\n 生えてる:
Rhone Carrots are supposed to grow in the far
south of the Rhone Woodlands on this side of
the world.

64637.「サリュウコツは こっちの世界の\n アラハギーロ地方の 東の砂漠にいる\n <:
It seems you can find Sand Bones by defeating
Dragon Zombies in the eastern desert of this
world's Al-Ahagiro Region.

64638.「おい セラフィ！\n 人の家で 勝手なマネしてんじゃねぇよ！:
Ey', Seraphi! Don't blab that psycho nonsense
in me' house!

64639.「私は ここで 薬の調合の準備をして\n 待ってるから よろしくね！:
I'll be here waiting for you, then I can mix
the potion.

64640.「シメールが大変なときに なに 悠長に\n 本なんか 読んでんだ！？\n いいか:
Oi! Wot are ya doin' readin' a book when
Shimere's in trouble?! Get out o' here or I
boot ya out me'self!

64641.「そろそろ <pc>さんが\n 帰ってくるはずだから\n 薬を調合する手順を 確:
<pc> should be back soon, so I'm just
going over the steps for mixing the medicine!

64643.「お願いした ローヌにんじんと\n サリュウコツを 集めてきてくれたのね。\n:
Looks like you gathered up the Rhone Carrots
and Sand Bones for me. We're all ready to go.

64644.「じゃあ さっそくだけど 薬を作って\n あの人に 飲ませてあげたいから\n 材:
Well, let's get started right away, and I want
to make a potion for him to take, so may I
have the ingredients?<yesno><close>

64645.「そんな…… 材料がないと 薬が作れないよ。\n どうしよう……。:
Oh no... I can't make the medicine without the
ingredients. What should I do...

64646.「ねえ <pc>さん 意地悪しないで……。\n 薬の材料 もらってもいいかな？<:
Hey <pc> don't be mean... can I have
the stuff for the medicine?<yesno><close>

64647.<pc>は セラフィに\nローヌにんじんと サリュウコツを\n渡した。:
<pc> gave Seraphi Rhone Carrot and
Sand Bone.

64648.「ありがとう！ これがあれば\n 薬を作って 病気の人たちを助けられるよ！:
Thank you! With this I can make medicine and
help those who are sick!

64649.セラフィは 薬を調合して\nシメールに飲ませた。:
Seraphi concocted a potion and gave it to
Shimere.

64650.「震えは おさまったみたい！: The shaking seems to have stopped!

64651.「……ん？ あんなに寒かったのに\n もう 寒くない…… オレ 治ったのか？:
Hmm? I was so cold, but I'm not cold
anymore... am I cured?

64652.「薬が 効いたみたいね。もう 大丈夫！: I guess the medicine worked. You're fine now!

64654.「<pc>さん 私ね……\n こうやって この国の人たちを守りたかったの。\n:
<pc>, I wanted to protect the people
of this country like this. That's why I
studied so much.

64655.「だって この国の真実を知っているのは\n 私だけだから……。:
Because I am the only one who knows the truth
about this country...

64656.「<pc>さん 協力してくれてありがとう。\n いつも 助けてもらってるね。\n:
<pc>, Thanks for your help. You've
always helped me out. Here's a little
something for you this time!

64657.「……ねえ シメールさん。\n なぜ この病気にかかったか 心当たりある？\n:
Hey, Mr. Shimere. Do you have any idea how
you got this disease? Since when did you get
cold?

64658.「そうだっ アイツだ！\n あのバッファロンを 見たときからだ！！: I recall I encountered a certain monster..

64660.「格闘場のショーで 最初に ベルムド王が\n ズッタズタにした あのバッファロン:
It's that Buffalon that King Bermud first
defeated in the arena!

64661.「夜中に ベルムドォォォ……って\n 低くうなる声がして 外に出てみたら\n ヤ:
In the middle of the night, I heard a low
growl, "Bermud..." I went outside and saw
him. He attacked me suddenly.

64662.「ところが そのまま オレの身体を通りぬけて\n 消えてっちゃってさ。\n あり:
However, it passed through my body and
disappeared. It's not a living monster...

64663.「怨霊だ…… 怨霊になって\n この町に 戻ってきたんだっ！！:
It has a grudge... and it's come back to this
town as a grudge!

64664.「そうだよ。アイツに襲われたときから 急に\n 猛烈な寒気が襲ってきて 身体が思:
That's right. When it attacked me, I suddenly
got a very intense chill and couldn't move
as much..

64665.「……やっぱり この病気は\n 怨霊が振りまいた 呪いなのね。:
I had a feeling this disease was a curse
wielded by a vengeful spirit.

64666.「ねぇ <pc>さん。最初のショーで\n 殺されたバッファロンって 元は人間だよ:
Hey <pc>. That Buffalon that was
killed in the first show, he used to be human.
...who was he?

64667.「うーん……。気になるけど \n 今は 病気にかかってる人たちに\n この薬を飲:
Hmmm... it bothers me, but right now I'd
rather give this medicine to those who are
sick first.

64668.「じゃ <pc>さん！ 私は もう行くね。\n 本当に 助かったよ！:
Well, <pc>! I'm going to go now.
Thank you so much for your help!
